titles.title: To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to simplify program operations and improve program management under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 5/14/1998--Introduced. Amends the Child Nutrition Act (CNA) to eliminate the ten percent limitation on the transfer of State administrative expense funds under CNA and the National School Lunch Act. Extends through FY 2003 the authorization of appropriations for State administrative expenses under CNA.
